channel.title: Npc Trouble!
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
Im Using A Devolution 7.0 Server Source And I Would Like To Know How To Change The Amount A Npc Hits, Because Atm They All Hit 0. I Assume This Is In Npchandler But I Would Like To Know What To Search And What To Add And What The Text Ill Be Adding/Editing Means.
All Help Is Appreciated.
Thanx. :)
